plays.text: Penalty to Scott Nichol 2 minutes for Hooking Eric Lindros

Penalty to Chris Clark 2 minutes for Roughing Matthew Barnaby
Penalty to Matthew Barnaby 2 minutes for Roughing Chris Clark
Penalty to Chris Clark 2 minutes for Tripping Brian Leetch
Penalty to Blake Sloan 2 minutes for Interference Rem Murray
Goal scored by Brian Leetch assisted by Mark Messier and Mikael Samuelsson
